description: Enterprise techniques used by gh0st RAT, ATT&CK software S0032 v2.0
name: gh0st RAT (S0032)

techniques.comment: gh0st RAT is able to open a remote shell to execute commands.[1][3]
gh0st RAT uses port 443 for C2 communications.[3]
A gh0st RAT variant has used DLL side-loading.[2]
gh0st RAT has the capability to to delete files.[1]
gh0st RAT is able to wipe event logs.[1]
gh0st RAT can create a new service to establish persistence.[3]
gh0st RAT has the capability to list processes.[1]
gh0st RAT adds a Registry Run key to establish persistence.[3]
gh0st RAT can download files to the victim’s machine.[3]
A gh0st RAT variant has used rundll32 for execution.[2]
gh0st RAT can capture the victim’s screen remotely.[3]
gh0st RAT uses RC4 and XOR to encrypt C2 traffic.[3]
